challenges.title: E-commerce Website
challenges.description: Build a fully functional e-commerce website using React or Vue. The website should include features such as product listing, product details, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment integration.
appRequirements: Display a list of products with images, titles, and prices
Implement search and filtering functionality for products
Allow users to add products to a shopping cart and update quantities
Implement user authentication and registration
Integrate with a payment gateway for secure transactions
Include responsive design for mobile and desktop views
Implement a backend API to manage product data and user orders

challenges.title: Social Media Dashboard
challenges.description: Create a social media dashboard using React, Vue, or Angular. The dashboard should display various social media metrics and provide insights on user engagement, follower growth, and content performance.
appRequirements: Fetch and display social media data from API endpoints
Implement charts and graphs to visualize metrics
Allow users to filter data by date range and social media platform
Provide insights and recommendations based on the data
Include user authentication to access personalized dashboards
Implement responsive design for different screen sizes
Optimize performance for handling large datasets

challenges.title: Task Management App
challenges.description: Develop a task management application using React, Vue, or Angular. The app should allow users to create tasks, set deadlines, assign priorities, and track progress.
appRequirements: Create, update, and delete tasks
Set task deadlines and priorities
Implement drag-and-drop functionality for task organization
Allow users to assign tasks to team members
Include notifications and reminders for upcoming deadlines
Implement user authentication and access control
Store task data in a database for persistence

challenges.title: Weather Forecast App
challenges.description: Build a weather forecast application using React, Vue, or Angular. The app should retrieve weather data from a public API and display current weather conditions and a multi-day forecast.
appRequirements: Fetch weather data from a weather API
Display current weather conditions (temperature, humidity, wind speed, etc.)
Show a multi-day forecast with daily temperature highs and lows
Implement search functionality for different locations
Include icons or images to represent weather conditions
Provide options to switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit
Optimize performance by caching API responses

challenges.title: Portfolio Website
challenges.description: Create a personal portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Showcase your skills, projects, and achievements in a visually appealing and responsive design.
appRequirements: Design and implement a visually appealing layout
Include sections for about me, skills, projects, and contact information
Display project images, descriptions, and links
Make the website responsive for different screen sizes
Implement smooth scrolling and interactive animations
Optimize the website for fast loading speed
Ensure accessibility by following best practices

challenges.title: Interactive Image Gallery
challenges.description: Build an interactive image gallery using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The gallery should allow users to view and navigate through a collection of images with additional features like zooming, captions, and slideshow.
appRequirements: Display a grid of thumbnail images
Implement zoom functionality for images
Include captions or descriptions for each image
Allow users to navigate through images using next and previous buttons
Add a slideshow feature to automatically cycle through images
Ensure responsive design for different devices
Optimize image loading and performance
